data.message: RIVERTON 9:49AM ffc leach highway color west around riverton hidden in Bush .
RIVERTON 9:19AM\

>This is another paragraph.

hidden in Bush .

GREENWOOD - LONG GONE 
8.20am
Handhelds on Coolibah Drive opposite Greenwood Senior High School nabbing both sides. 

*Admin assumes they’re gone now and apologies for the delays in posting.

FREMANTLE
9:13AM
FFC being set up for traffic heading towards Fremantle

BALGA
8.42am
Two cops with handhelds corner of Balga Ave and Finchley Crescent in the 40km school zone.

EAST PERTH - POSSIBLE SPEED CAMERA
8.15am
Possible camera Graham Farmer Fwy under the East Parade underpass. Anybody able to confirm for certain?

OSBORNE PARK
8.09am
Motorbike cop with a handheld on Hutton Street before Main Street heading east in the 40km/hr school zone at Osborne Park Primary School.

YANGEBUP - ON THE MOVE 
8.05am
Booze bus traveling east Spearwood Ave maybe to set up on Beeliar Drive. Where will it set up?

BURSWOOD - TRAILER CAMERA STILL THERE 30/7/2018 
7.45am
Speed camera trailer Graham Farmer Fwy after the Victoria Park Drive turn off heading eastbound. 

*Admin assumes this trailer speed camera will remain for up to another 2 days or maybe less. It was set up three days ago.

BURSWOOD - TRAILER CAMERA STILL THERE 30/7/2018 
7.45am
Speed camera trailer Graham Farmer Fwy after the Victoria Park Drive turn off heading eastbound. .

*Admin assumes this trailer speed camera will remain for up to another 2 days or maybe less. It was set up three days ago.

***DAILY LOCATIONS - MONDAY 30 JULY 2018***

Good morning everyone!! Here are Monday’s listed speed camera locations. PLEASE READ THIS ENTIRE POST FOR USEFUL INFO!!! IT MAY HELP YOU AVOID GETTING INFRINGED!! 

The attached list is a useful guide so make good use of it and share the list with everyone you know. The more of you who view the list on a daily basis the more beneficial it will be to everyone. Note the following: 

- There are a total of 50 locations listed today with a total of 10 school zones.

- Be on the look out for the early morning and occasional late night double speed camera set up. They set up as early as 4.30am and late nights tend to stay until 12.10am from past experience. These set up locations don’t necessarily align with the attached list so be mindful of that. 

- Also look out for possible early set ups on rural roads.

- Be advised that you may still come across speed cameras that aren't on the attached list during the day, particularly on rural roads. The list is a fantastic guide for many speed camera locations but isn't completely exclusive. 

- Keep your eyes peeled for any confirmed speed camera sightings, traffic police activity, crashes or other traffic alerts and message them to us directly. We greatly appreciate your reports and rely on YOUR sightings to inform everyone else. 

- Having said that, enjoy your day, drive safely and don't get pinged by any speed traps! Let's commence the week without incurring any infringements!

*These locations can be found from the link below: 

https://www.police.wa.gov.au/Traffic/Cameras/Camera-locations

BURSWOOD - TRAILER CAMERA STILL THERE 29/7/2018 
10.25pm
Speed camera trailer Graham Farmer Fwy after the Victoria Park Drive turn off heading eastbound. .

*Admin assumes this trailer speed camera will remain for up to another 3 days or maybe less. It was set up two days ago.

PERTH CBD 
8.27pm
Motorcycle cops presumably doing RBT’s on Mounts Bay Road in the CBD under the Mitchell Freeway bridge.

GLEN FORREST
8.28pm
There’s a speed camera on Great Eastern Hwy just before Glen Forrest. 👍🏻

DOUBLEVIEW
8.15pm
Speed camera on Scarborough Beach Road in Doubleview just before Huntriss Rd. :/

MITCHELL FWY - REVENUE RAISING BLITZ
8.15pm
Admin has received reports of speed cameras all along the Mitchell Fwy at the following locations this evening: 

- Perth CBD interchange (both directions)
- Karrinyup Rd off ramp 80km section (north)
- Next to Hodges Drive (both directions) 

*Please let everyone know and note the two locations with both directions may stay until as late as midnight!!

WEST PERTH - LATE NIGHT CAMERAS BOTH SIDES
8.15pm
Speed cameras both directions Mitchell Freeway through the CBD interchange. Both are well hidden. 

*Admin believes these two operators may remain until late 12.10am or earlier as well as those at Hodges Drive.

JOONDALUP - DUAL SPEED CAMERA SETUP
8.15pm
Speed cameras getting both directions of traffic on Mitchell Fwy near Hodges Drive. 

*Admin assumes they both may be remaining late until 12.10am or earlier based off past experience. The northbound speed camera was sighted earlier and that link is given below:

https://www.facebook.com/171302139596632/posts/1909290545797774/

INNALOO
8.11pm
Speed camera Mitchell Fwy northbound on the Cedric St / Karrinyup Rd off ramp in the 80km section.

HILLARYS - STILL THERE
7.41pm
RBT bus Hepburn Ave eastbound in Hillarys before Marmion Ave.

MERRIWA
7.31pm
Ute speed camera Hester Ave in Merriwa going north up the hill near Baltimore Parade.

BENTLEY
6.59pm
Speed camera in a white ute on Albany Highway in Bentley opposite Bentley Plaza Shops heading towards the city.

JOONDALUP
5.36pm
Speed camera catching southbound traffic on Mitchell Fwy, near Hodges Dr.

5.07pm
RBT bus Hepburn avenue going towards Marmion Avenue.
Hepburn ave Hillarys east bound booze bus

WELSHPOOL

Road closed due to a crash at the Clayton St and Military Rd intersection. Cops and ambulance on site. Avoid at all costs.
Booze bus Hepburn ave heading away from Hillary’s

Mitchell Freeway south bound where it goes to 80k. Tripod camera on right hand side under bridge, in the usual spot

After ventnor

Speed camera in back of white hilux. Brookton hwy before Ellen road in Mount Nasura. It's in plain view but on apex bend just as you enter 60 km zone facing city bound traffic.

***DAILY LOCATIONS - SUNDAY 29 JULY 2018***

Good morning everyone!! Here are Sunday’s listed speed camera locations. PLEASE READ THIS ENTIRE POST FOR USEFUL INFO!!! IT MAY HELP YOU AVOID GETTING INFRINGED!! 

The attached list is a useful guide so make good use of it and share the list with everyone you know. The more of you who view the list on a daily basis the more beneficial it will be to everyone. Note the following: 

- There are a total of 44 locations listed today.

- Be on the look out for occasional late night double speed camera set up. Late nights tend to stay until 12.10am from past experience. These set up locations don’t necessarily align with the attached list so be mindful of that. 

- Also look out for possible early set ups on rural roads.

- Be advised that you may still come across speed cameras that aren't on the attached list during the day, particularly on rural roads. The list is a fantastic guide for many speed camera locations but isn't completely exclusive. 

- Keep your eyes peeled for any confirmed speed camera sightings, traffic police activity, crashes or other traffic alerts and message them to us directly. We greatly appreciate your reports and rely on YOUR sightings to inform everyone else. 

- Having said that, enjoy your day, drive safely and don't get pinged by any speed traps! Let's conclude the weekend without incurring any infringements!

*These locations can be found from the link below: 

https://www.police.wa.gov.au/Traffic/Cameras/Camera-locations

Seems to be a higher than usual police presence in Leederville. Have seen a marked cop car and two motorcycle cops  stop people on Oxford St. Admin assumes they may be patrolling the area tonight. Drive carefully!
